attributes.action: Stop the Potential closure of Wideopen Nursery
attributes.additional_details:
With the nursery only being 73% (Muriel Green states) the local authorities are looking at potentially closing it.

Local families MAY have to travel to other, perhaps more expensive nursery's or not be able to do this at all!
How do they expect parents to work either full-time or part time if local places such as Wideopen Nursery is closed.

The nursery has served a huge purpose over a number of years. OfSted reports show that they are doing well. 'Good'.

Let's send a message to our kids & lead by example by fighting for our local nursery.

Don't play politics with our kids lives!
